h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Thunderbolt Horn Location
content: Soaks are more common than the Drinks for your Gourds in the game. They are scattered throughout the chapters. For even more guides on these areas, check out our full Black Myth: Wukong walkthrough. You can also keep track of the Awaken Wine Worm locations and Luoija Fragrant Vine locations, which are key to upgrading your healing potential and Gourd.

The content is as follows:
Soaks are more common than the Drinks for your Gourds in the game. They are scattered throughout the chapters. For even more guides on these areas, check out our full Black Myth: Wukong walkthrough. You can also keep track of the Awaken Wine Worm locations and Luoija Fragrant Vine locations, which are key to upgrading your healing potential and Gourd.
